A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.HumanPlayer
method is called when a button is clicked, calls the play() method
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.PlayerContext
As one of the concrete subclasseses of player is an action listener this class must be too,hence this overridden method.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.BackButton
closes the program
originally this was going to take you back to the main menu so that you could play again if you wish but somethings broken in the turn taking gubbins.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.MenuChoseAIType
provides behaviour for the combo box by setting the game engine to the appropriate one from the list
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.MenuChosePlayer
changes the player tokens around when item is selected
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.MenuQuitGame
exit when button pressed
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.MenuStartButton
when this button isclicked the main menu is disabled and the board view is enabled
activePlayer - Static variable in class view.SideBar
player indicator JLabel
addActionListeners() - Method in class view.StartMenu
add action listeners for the components
addbuttonListeners() - Method in class view.BoardPanel
register button Listeners with correct buttons
addButtons() - Method in class view.BoardPanel
used by constructor
adds the buttons to the JPanel
addButtons() - Method in class view.StartMenu
used by constructor
adds the buttons to the JPanel
attachController(PlayerContext) - Method in class view.BoardPanel
register a controller with this panel.
attachController(PlayerContext) - Method in class view.GameWindow
register a controller with this view
